thread.title: MS Dhoni OUT, Steve Smith IN as Rising Pune Supergiants captain! IPL 2017 fans express anger over sacking Dhoni
thread.title_full: MS Dhoni OUT, Steve Smith IN as Rising Pune Supergiants captain! IPL 2017 fans express anger over sacking Dhoni

author: Rashmi Mishra
title: MS Dhoni OUT, Steve Smith IN as Rising Pune Supergiants captain! IPL 2017 fans express anger over sacking Dhoni
text: > Buzz MS Dhoni OUT, Steve Smith IN as Rising Pune Supergiants captain! IPL 2017 fans express anger over sacking Dhoni Under Dhoni's captaincy, Chennai Super Kings have won two Indian Premier League titles and the 2010 Champions League Twenty20. MS Dhoni became the captain of Rising Pune Supergiants which replaced Chennai Super Kings in IPL. By Rashmi Mishra  22 PM IST
